{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC68 |revision=UF |series=AC1900 |asin=B00I7EM752 |fcc_date=03/30/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTAC68UV2 |ic_id=3568A-RTAC68UV2 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=1.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F2G16128A-BDB |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ASUS Router App, AiCloud support, AiMesh, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36;brcmarm; |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps max PHY rate for the 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''600''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC68UF/ Product Page] ===FCC info=== *The ''ASUS'' logo, "RT-AC68U-V2", "REV 3.00" and "HannStar KMV-4" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :'''CPU''': [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0KFEBG @1.0GHz :'''Flash''': ''Spansion'' S34ML01G200TFI00 128MB :'''RAM''': ''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A-BDB 256MB :'''WLAN''': 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602KMLG 3T3R ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32609-asus-rt-ac68p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC68P Wireless-AC1900 Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=20297 ''ASUS RT-AC68P Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Features=== *Airtime Fairness, Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control *Dual WAN, IPTV support, Roaming Assist, Guest Network (3x) *VPN server: IPSec Pass-Through, PPTP Pass-Through, :L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server *VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client *Mac OS Backup, Enhanced media server (AiPlayer App) :Image: jpeg, Audio: mp3, wma, wav, pcm, mp4, lpcm, ogg :Video: asf, avi, divx, mpeg, mpg, ts, vob, wmv, mkv, mov *AiCloud personal cloud service, 3G/4G data sharing *Printer Server: LPR protocol support :Multifunctional printer support (Windows only) *Download Master: Download scheduling :Support bt, nzb, http, ed2k :Support encryption, DHT, PEX and magnet link :Upload and download bandwidth control *AiDisk file server: Samba and FTP server :with account management ===See also=== *[[ASUS RT-AC68UF]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC68UF/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC68P]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68P/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC68U]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68U/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900/ Product Page] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900P/ Product Page] (CPU Dual-Core @1.4GHz) __NOTOC__
